name: Stars Collector
description:
Avoid the UFO while collecting all the stars in the screen!

  • Yellow stars grant 1 point. White ones, 10.
  • The green pill makes you faster for a short time.
  • Press "M" to turn on/off the music.

This game was created during a Godot course. Graphical assets are from Kenney except for the music and some SFX.
